content: मस्ज् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (मज्जति, मग्न; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} मज्जयति; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} मिमंक्षति) {@--1@} To bathe, plunge, dip or throw oneself into water; <ls>R. 15. 101</ls>; <ls>Bv. 2. 95.</ls> {@--2@} To sink, sink into or down, sink under, plunge (with <ab>loc.</ab> or <ab>acc.</ab>); सीदन्नंधे तमसि विधुरो मज्जतीवांतरात्मा <ls>U. 3. 38</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 20</ls>; सोऽसंवृतं नाम तमः सह तेनैव मज्जति <ls>Ms. 4. 81</ls>; <ls>R. 16. 72.</ls> {@--3@} To be drowned, perish, (in water). {@--4@} To sink into misfortune. {@--5@} To despond, be discouraged or disheartened. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (मज्जयति) {@--1@} To cause to sink, immerse, dip, drown. {@--2@} To deluge, inundate, overwhelm.
